name: empiricist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who believes in using methods based on what is experienced or seen rather than on theory: The principal division among economists is between the empiricists and the theoreticians. See
empiricism
More examplesFewer examplesTo say the debate is between theorists and empiricists is to oversimplify.The mayor became an innovative pragmatist, an empiricist who leaned on new technologies to help dramatically reduce crime.Jung was an empiricist, and in that respect he was also a scientist.
